input.sentences: my walk to the beach was quite refreshing .
the rocks were hard to walk over .
some trees had a great view of the ocean .
the open vastness is fascinating to me .
i stopped by an old building and slept in it .
output.sentences: We decided to go on a walk along the beach.
Soon the sand turned into rocks which made the walk way harder.
However the view, with all the trees, was too pretty to leave.
It was fascinating to look at the vastness of the ocean.
We had to stop and turn around, however, because it was getting dark and we needed to sleep.
